articles.title: Centre for digital assets research launched
articles.author: Our Correspondent
articles.summary: Centre for Digital Assets Research (CeDAR) at LUMS was officially launched here on Thursday. It aims to be a hub of excellence in research, training, development and innovation in the areas of decentralised internet, Web 3.0, and digital asset technologies. CeDAR hosted an international conference to mark its official launch. The event highlighted the importance of industry-government collaboration to accelerate the adoption of digital assets.

articles.title: Explosive Crypto Debate: Helius CEO Clashes with Cardano Founder Over Ethereum's Future
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: The head of a Solana-based development firm has a heated exchange with the founder of one of the largest competitors in the cryptocurrency space. This latest skirmish highlights the ongoing rivalry and strong opinions within the world of Bitcoin and the Bitcoin ecosystem. It is not clear what sparked the latest exchange.
